title: Uruguayan Author Eduardo Galeano, Critic Of Capitalism, Dies At 74
teaser: Galeano's 1971 book Open Veins of Latin America was a fierce critique of U.S. and European imperialism. It made him an enemy of the right-wing governments that ruled much of Latin America at the time.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
